title: RUET to collect student fees online
body: Rajshahi University of Engineering and Technology has decided to collect studentsâ€™ fees online aimed at ensuring transparency and accountability in the collection process. The RUET has decided this in its 83rd meeting of the finance committee held at the conference room with vice-chancellor Professor SM Abdur Razzaque in the chair on Saturday. A decision has also been taken to implement different policies for operating the overall academic and administrative activities properly in the meeting. The policies included fund allocation for the final-year thesis and project of undergraduate students, dormitory operation and use and online fees collection.
